lines.gurmukhi: kOn gun gwie kY rIJweIAY gun inDwn; kvn mohn jg mohn ibmohIAY [

Unknown.translation: Singing what virtues of the treasure-house of merits can we please Him? With what pleasant actions can we enamor the bewitcher of the world?

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ikhVy gux gw ky gux inDwn nUM pRsMn krIey, ikhVI mohnhwr vsqU nwl jgmohn vwihgurU nUM Awpxy qy moihq krIey?

lines.gurmukhi: kOn suK dY kY suKswgr srx ghON; BUKn kvn icMqwmix mn mohIAY [

Unknown.translation: What comfort can be offered to the sea of comforts that would provide us His refuge? With what embellishments can we captivate the mind of the Lord who fulfils all desires?

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ikhVw suK dy ky suKwˆ dy smuMdr dI Srn PVIey, ikhVy gihxy nwl icMqwmxI dw mn moihq krIey?

lines.gurmukhi: koit bRhmwNf ky nwXk kI nwXkw hÍY; kYsy AMqRjwmI kOn aukq kY bohIAY [

Unknown.translation: How can one become the wife of the Lord-Master of millions of Universes? With what means and methods can the knower of inner things be apprised of the anguish of the mind?

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: kRoVwˆ bRhmwˆfwˆ dy mwlk pRBU dI nwiek ikvyˆ hoeIey qy AMqrjwmI nUM ikhVI jugqI nwl smJw skIey[

lines.gurmukhi: qnu mnu Dnu hY srbsu ibsÍ jwN kY bsu; kYsy bsu AwvY jwN kI soBw lg sohIAY [602[

Unknown.translation: The Lord who has the mind, body, wealth and the world in His control, involvement in whose praise one becomes adorable; how can such a Lord be brought in one's favour?  (602)

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: qn mn Dn qy sMswr dw swrw srbMs ijs dy v`s ivc hY, auh ikvyˆ v`s Aw skdw hY ijs dI soBw nUM l`g ky sohxy ho jweIdw hY ]602]
